Sources Panel

Build a curated knowledge base from PDFs, URLs, GitHub repos, YouTube transcripts, and Google Docs. Every AI recommendation links back to specific source chunks you can verify.

app.latticelab.io

Multi-Source Ingestion

Add knowledge from multiple source types. Lattice handles the chunking, embedding, and indexing automatically.

  • PDF Documents: Upload technical papers, whitepapers, and documentation
  • Web URLs: Import pricing pages, model cards, and vendor docs
  • GitHub Repos: Connect to README files and documentation
  • YouTube: Index video transcripts for technical talks
  • Google Docs: Import from your Drive

Hybrid Semantic Search

Find relevant content across all your sources with a combination of semantic similarity and keyword matching.

  • Vector embeddings for semantic understanding
  • Keyword matching for exact terms and model names
  • Cross-source discovery of related content

Citation Tracking

Every AI recommendation includes numbered citations linking back to specific chunks in your sources. Verify claims with one click.

  • Numbered inline citations in AI responses
  • Click to expand and see source context
  • Track decision provenance back to authoritative docs

Real-time Indexing

Watch your sources get processed in real-time. See chunk counts and indexing progress as content becomes searchable.

  • Live indexing progress indicators
  • Chunk count displayed per source
  • Automatic embedding generation

Build Your AI Knowledge Base

Start adding sources and get grounded recommendations with full citations.
